text:
民国奇探第二个世界CP路垚（活在当下，解开心结）
星汉灿烂第第三个世界～（溯洄以往，弥补遗憾，却是庄周梦蝶～。）
长月烬明第四个世界CP澹台烬，叶夕雾CP萧凛（澹台烬，我只想活到最后～，可是，现在看起来有点难～）正在更新
莲花楼（神医圣手CP李莲花李莲花好好活着，自在江湖）正在更新
trans:
The second world CP Luyao of My Roommate Is A Detective (Live in the moment and unravel your heart knots)
The third world of Love Like the Galaxy ~ ( Tracing the past and making up for the regrets are both Zhuang Zhou's dream of a butterfly ~.)
The fourth world CP Tan Taijin, Ye Xiwu CP Xiao Lin of Till the End of the Moon(Tan Taijin, I just want to survive till the end~, but, it looks a bit hard now~) is updated
Mysterious Lotus Casebook (Divine Doctor CP Li Lianhua. Li Lianhua lives well and enjoys himself in the world) is updated
